website_summaries.verdict: Ideal daytime moisturizer for younger people hoping to prevent further skin issues.
pros: Great value for the number of high quality ingredients
Most people enjoy the light scent
Doesn't leave skin greasy or feel thick after application
cons: For serious wrinkles, brown spots and age spots, a specialized product might be a better choice

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes well, but the scent is overpowering
customer_reviews.text: This does the job of moisturizing, and a little bit goes a long way (I can moisturize my face and neck with 1-2 pea size amounts). It is thicker than I would like--you can feel it on your face after applying. It also has an extremely strong scent, and not a pleasant one. As previous reviews have mentioned, it smells like candy. Overwhelmingly so. The scent stays on you as well, I could smell it on my face 24 hours after applying.
customer_reviews.author: meb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Daily Face Moisturizer without Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Light to Medium consistency that doesn't feel greasy, but thick enough to feel like it could last the day. No sunscreen, natural, I put it on before my mineral-based base powder & spots I cover w cream base. I'm happy for the no sulfates, parabens, phthalates, dyes, etc. I also love the 100% recycled packaging & their partnership with the Nature Conservancy & water conservation efforts. Works fine on my eyes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Ruthstrom

customer_reviews.title: great for sensitive combination skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin gets dry and flaky, then immediately so oily you could grease a frypan, then a few hours later i start flaking again. This stuff, when used in conjunction with their facial scrub in the same product line, has honestly changed my skincare routine. I've eliminated like 6 products and now I just use these 2, once a day in the morning after my shower. It's even helped with scalp flaking, it moisturizes my face and neck and hairline so well that it must help keep the scalp moist too. I've had really bad luck with skincare so I'm desperately hoping they never discontinue this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena's best moisturizer for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin so every beautiful, fragrant facial moisturizer cannot work for me. Having tried a gamut of options available from high end boutiques as well as CVS/Target, I have settled on this one. This moisturizer has a slight scent (pleasant) and dries up fast without any greasy left over or oily look. I am on my second tube - each tube will last you 2 months minimum.
customer_reviews.author: zee

customer_reviews.title: Won’t clog pores / does have fragrance
customer_reviews.text: My go-to for winter. I’ve been using this stuff for years and just figured out I could buy it at the best price on amazon! I have a normal-dry skin type and get the most use out of this in the winter because I use it in the morning and at night. In the summer months I will typically only use this at night. If I travel somewhere very cold and dry I will layer this over my neutrogena hydroboost twice a day. It does have fragrance in it but I actually love the smell and find it to be pretty mild.
customer_reviews.author: HBC

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS MOISTURIZER. I bought this at Target once and then they stopped selling it. Found it at CVS for $20. Jesus that is ridiculous. So happy I found it on Amazon for half that. It does wonders for my extremely sensitive skin. It also evened out my skin tone. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin beware!!
customer_reviews.text: After I washed my face and applied this moisturizer, I noticed my cheeks burning with a red rash. I also found this to be greasy and too thick for me. The scent was ok. But whatever is in there definitely did not agree with my skin. Be careful if you have very sensitive skin. I will not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerSilverpet

customer_reviews.title: Great for aging, acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those people blessed enough to have acne into middle age and couple it with wrinkles! Well, I was very very nervous to get off my harsh facial wash & lotion, but also knew it was time. This was perfect! Maybe I would have needed something stronger a decade ago, but the time was right, I'm blemish-free, and my skin looks & feels great! I am repeating this review in the facial wash product that I use (in case you see this review again and think: Haven't I read that before?
customer_reviews.author: E. Leah

customer_reviews.title: Good value at least
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer works great for sensitive skin. It’s mostly natural ingredients which is rare for neutrogena. It moisturizes my skin very well, a little greasy but I can get over it. The price is great, especially for a natural product. I wouldn’t buy it again, but nice to use it on both my face and body
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Love this product line
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It's my all-time favorite and was actually referred to me by a person who was giving me a natural facial, she said it was her everyday product. It's very creamy and has an amazing smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Stearns

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST FACE LOTION - I’ve used it for years
customer_reviews.text: This is the only facial moisturizer I have used for years and I constantly get compliments on my skin. I don’t wear any makeup but this gives my skin a dewey, healthy glow. It sounds a bit dramatic and arrogant but I honestly have great skin and I credit it in some part to this awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Let me first point out that I like the scent, even though something natural shouldn't have much of one. Right as soon as I put it on my face it felt like it was instantly clogging my pores, it is so greasy and feels like a hand lotion. If you have sensitive/combo skin don't buy this, it was also stinging my face. It gave me two huge zits after one use. I guess the only plus to this is I have a new hand lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer/ Doesn’t Clog Pores
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this moisturizer for a while and love it. I have sensitive skin and this doesn’t break me out (this product is non-comedogenic which I really appreciate). This product gives my skin a natural healthy glow and really does work for me! I do suggest to first test it out on the back of the hand like most products recommend. The only other thing I should mention is the strong scent it has. I personally like the scent and it doesn’t bother me at all. However, for those who aren’t a fan of fragrances, this might be overpowering. Overall, I think this is a very good moisturizer (decent price too!).
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: My favorite moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: One of the best moisturizers from the drugstore. All the ingredients are fantastic and it’s clean and not full of any harsh items. I have used high end and drugstore moisturizers and this one is my favorite. I have oily skin and it’s not greasy and does not cause any breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Good moisture but burns a bit going on.
customer_reviews.text: This has a pleasant texture and is nice and thick so a little bit goes a long way. Others have mentioned a smell-I find it very faint and not at all bothersome. I do not have sensitive skin at all and find that this burns slightly upon application. It goes away after a few minutes, so I kept the product because it works well and is inexpensive with natural ingredients. If you have sensitive skin, you may not like...
customer_reviews.author: RHSPT

customer_reviews.title: Great price, keeps my skin super soft
customer_reviews.text: I used to spend more than $40 for a small container of facial moisturizer at L'Occitane, but when I had a baby, money was more scarce. I tried this this one on a whim because I have always loved Neutrogena products. I was very happy with it and this costs only one third of what I had been paying. One container last me several months and I live in Arizona, where I have to use facial moisturizer every day. This one is not oily and leaves my skin super soft.
customer_reviews.author: J. Austin

customer_reviews.title: No Toxic Chemicals but Does Have Toxic Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This overall is a well priced moisturizer that doesn't have all the chemicals in it that the majority do. The problem is the whole purpose of people typically going down the "chemical free" route is to remove as much unnecessary add ons as possible and therefore limit exposure. The fragrance in this lotion is overwhelming. There is plenty of research that points to the possible down sides of fragrance related chemicals. Take the same product and remove the fragrance and related chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product gave me a rash that itched that lasted for days!
customer_reviews.text: This made my face swell up, turn red and really warm, and gave me a bad rash on my face neck ears and hands that itched terribly. I even had a temperature of 100! I have other neutrogena products that don't have this effect so I don't know why this one is different but I don't recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Featherly

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This broke me out so bad. I have extremely sensitive skin. It also smells horrible. Going back to thr acne.org moisturizer which is the only thing that keeps me clear. I just tried this because it's natural
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not hypogenic or allergy free
customer_reviews.text: Haha this stuff is not hypogenic I got a very bad face rash for almost a week from this stuff won't buy it again
customer_reviews.author: stella123

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love! My go-to
customer_reviews.text: Love! Thick in the begging of applying but goes on beautifully and thins out therefore no need for a lot when applying, which allows me to have the product for a long time It last long on my face and does a great job at keeping it moisturized. I apply at night after I wash my face in the shower and in the morning when I wake up. I use it more during the winter time as well and my face soaks it up and stays hydrated! Cheaper on amazon too instead of buying at the pharmacy
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance is harsh, artificial
customer_reviews.text: This product’s ingredient list is great until you get to the fragrance which is too strong for the face. It reminds me of an artificial bathroom cleaner fragrance or an artificial-chemical air freshener for the bathroom. Other than that, it moisturizes well and feels nice. I just wish it didn’t have that fragrance chemical. When I put it on it makes the skin around my eyes sting a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Have switched to this
customer_reviews.text: After years of using an expensive moisturizer, I've switched to this product. It's the only moisturizer that I've ever purchased that explains where the contents are sourced. It is the best I've ever used, and the smell is wonderful. Clean, not greasy and it really is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Loux Dba Vintage

customer_reviews.title: Creamy Lotion
customer_reviews.text: Liked the lotion, nice and creamy. The scent is a bit weird and very sweet. Not my favorite. I would love to buy this lotion in unscented if made. I have used Neutrogena products for years, and this is the first one I cannot use on my face, as the scent is too strong for me. Otherwise, I would love it.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Deep Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product in the past from a local drugstore, paying twice the price. I am so glad to find it on Amazon.com, with the same features I like, gentle and deep moisturizing. So many people have commented on how my skin looks smooth and well hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Flocan

customer_reviews.title: Can't stand the smell
customer_reviews.text: Does an OK job, absorbs fairly well and not greasy ... but the scent is horrible, too strong, and lingers far too long.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Name Says it All
customer_reviews.text: It works well over the so-called "men's" moisturizers out there that you pay twice as much for. I have been very pleased at the results so far
customer_reviews.author: SoCalMark

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely! Didn't help my skin, clogged my pores
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this stuff. NEUTROGENA has amazing products. This just wasn't for me I guess. It broke me out really bad with nodule acne in places on my face that I don't get pimples. It moisturizes really good and smells lovely though.
customer_reviews.author: Gesel

customer_reviews.title: too much scent
customer_reviews.text: This product is so highly scented that I threw it in the trash almost immediately after opening. The scent is so overwhelmingly strong it actually affected my breathing; fortunately Amazon quickly refunded my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angelaya

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and and very dry skin; 58 years of age. I have had no bad reaction to this or any Neutrogena products! It feels light but moisturizers great in the morning before applying makeup. Smells good. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Oily skin
customer_reviews.text: It's great for oily skin that is sensitive. It won't clogs pores and it's not oily. Great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald P

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years. Recently, I was disappointed to see that my local retail store stopped selling it. I was relieved to find it on Amazon. It is very moisturizing, feels light on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have difficulty finding something i can wear while moisturizing. I love the smell of the cream and have been using this for two years without breakout. Ill use it during the day and i love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Greasy...Doesn't Absorb Well
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for a heavy somewhat greasy product then this is for you. Doesn't really absorb very well. While this is not for me, someone with really dry skin may like the product. It's just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: NMGal

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I liked all the vitamins that went into my skin but I didn’t like how it made me breakout. I wouldn’t suggest this for those with acne prone skin. I haven’t had a breakout in years! So this was quite a surprise. I really wanted it to work since it sounds so good. It’s a cream and I do prefer a gel base since I can breakout.
customer_reviews.author: L Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great moisture
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend told me about this and it works great it is hard to find in stores so I ordered from Amazon had a great smell and texture and my skin haven't been better and it's softer
customer_reviews.author: Dr Burns

customer_reviews.title: Cleans
customer_reviews.text: I use this as face wash when I shower. It doesn't bubble as much as I would like but it seems to leave my face clean and not totally dried out - it also doesn't irritate my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and scent of this moisturizer. I was looking for an older product by Neutrogena that was in a pump bottle and my only disappointment in this one is that it is in a squeeze tube. I was looking for a moisturizer with no sunscreen in it. This is very light and soaks in easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer. I use it in the morning and when I go to bed. My skin stays soft until the next application. The scent is heavenly, lol. Highly recommend. (I have “regular” skin.)
customer_reviews.author: CrazyDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have other products from the same brand that I really like, so this time I decided to try the Natural one, but I didn’t like it. My face skin feels oily and dense after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Utopia91

customer_reviews.title: Causes itchiness & acne
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product so badly. It moisturizers well, but it made me breakout and my face itches like crazy. I have sensitive skin and have used more natural products before, but I will never purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Lonardo

customer_reviews.title: Tingly skin
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have sensitive skin at all and this made my forehead tingle all day. I thought something was wrong with me. As soon as i stopped using it, my skin stopped feeling numb. Loved the texture and hydration factor.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite facial moisturizer. It not oily at all and soaks into the sink within seconds. It also smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect moisturizer for sensitive skin!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my holy grail moisturizer. I've been using it for years now. It's moisturizing without feeling greasy. It's great for sensitive skin. And it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Ugh! Neutrogena... Make this fragrance free!
customer_reviews.text: Wow... I couldn’t even get this on. The scent is extremely overpowering. It might be free from dyes and for sensitive skin, but the fragrance is just terrible! Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I’m super picky about face lotion and love this one. Light / no scent. Not greasy but still moisturizes well, even during dry winter days. Super great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: The perfect mix... just amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing if you are acne prone. Perfect product: Vegan, Recycled plastic, not tested in animals, 97% natural, travel size, smell good, hydrate well, not parabens, not greasy... almost perfect... the only thing missing is SFP 50+ protection. Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMaster

customer_reviews.title: My favorite skin care products
customer_reviews.text: Very soft smell, good moisturizing and it works very good on my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: enmanuelhm

customer_reviews.title: it is very dense, greasy sensation
customer_reviews.text: it is very dense, greasy sensation, has a strong aroma. The first day I used it, my skin reddened. at least it didn't work for me at all
customer_reviews.author: Maria Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have good skin, but rarely my skin got dry and nothing helped. I tried expensive creams and cheap ones. but only this moisturizer made my skin better than before. now I have a new point in the morning and evening facial routine.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Great soap, faulty pump
customer_reviews.text: Live the soap but the pump top was defective and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this moisturizer for a few years now and have struggled recently to find it in my local stores, so I ordered it here. It has a subtle scent, feels great on my skin and doesn't make my breakouts worse. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stef Evilsizer

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful and nice to have
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my face all the time, it's very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I L-O-V-E Neutrogena and specially this line. I use all the product for about 4 years already and don’t think I’ll change it too soon. Can’t find this in any super market anymore, so I’m glad Amazon has it!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hotz Fioreze

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. Will keep on buying it. So far happy with the product. Takes time to know if it does what is advertised
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Olay, but this is much better. I like how it is natural and isn't greasy. I have dyr skin and have loved using this. I can't wait to put it on after a shower. Smells super fresh too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like lysol
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t like the smell at all. It reminds me of lemon scented cleaning products. I will be keeping this for emergency use only.
customer_reviews.author: Syad10

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product but it unfortunately made my skin break out into a red rash. The texture and moisture it gave my skin was great, it smelled great, but it irritated my skin. It also had no seal on the bottle which bothers me. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Smells yummy! Works good !
customer_reviews.text: I like this moisturizer it smells good and is good for dry skin. The only thing is you don't need much. I used to much and my skin felt sweaty. So just use about a dime size.
customer_reviews.author: Krillin

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite moisturizer ever. A little goes a long way, so you need just a very small amount to cover your face. Love that it hasn’t more natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get enough!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve switched to this line. Scent, feel, results. It makes me want to wash my face! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! My skin feels so soft and I was pleasantly surprised by the subtle scent. I dispose perfume type scents that over power, this is perfect, sweet but not overpowering at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Daily use as well as under makeup. Not a greasy or slimy feel. Not scented. All around great product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stover

customer_reviews.title: this has a VERY strong scent. It didn't necessarily ...
customer_reviews.text: this has a VERY strong scent. It didn't necessarily irritate my sensitive skin, but it definitely didn't do anything to help improve it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Use this at nighttime since it does not have any spf which is probably the only negative thing about it but won’t take a star off since it wasn’t advertised to have any. My face skin look dewy and bright!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Smell so good and it has been good for my dry face
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: very nice cream
customer_reviews.text: I using this cream for almost a year, and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a light moisturizer. Doesn't make my face red like others. Skin is neither oily nor dry. Using year-round. Good product for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I finally found something thatll work with my Atopic Dermatitis and not leave me with breakouts, after just one use I could feel and see a difference in my dry skin. Feels great and doesnt dry sticky like past moisturizers I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had allergic reaction to one of the ingredients. Have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smell natural
customer_reviews.text: Smells like candy, artificial. Medium weight. I don’t like the scent. Using on hands instead of face.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love the way this goes on
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this goes on. Super light on my face and neck and literally has people asking me what I’ve done differently! Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Burnitt

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I totally bought this on a whim at my local rite aid and i have loved it ever since. It keeps my skin clear and moisturized. It's not oily and the scent is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this moisturizer for a couple years now. It’s fantastic. I have sensitive skin prone to acne and have no issues with this. Use it every night!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Looking my whole life
customer_reviews.text: Finally.. a great product that doesn't sting my eyes. I can't use anything with SPF in it. This product works just as creams that cost hundreds of dollars. Five stars all the way baby
customer_reviews.author: Laura Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Not enough moisture for dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: For some time I have been searching for a natural moisturizer that meets my criteria for ingredients and doesn't break my budget. While this face lotion is priced right, and I was so excited that Neutrogena took the plunge to create an environmentally thoughtful product, it wasn't a good fit for my skin. I found that I needed to use more of this face lotion than I have with other products, and still my skin remained dry. The smell that everyone talks about is odd. It's not unbearable, but you do have to wonder why Neutrogena would put such a scent into their product. Somebody must have been asleep at the wheel the day the scent test passed through compliance.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Woolley

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a greasy, oily residue.
customer_reviews.text: Very greasy and stays that way all day. My skin did not absorb this product at all. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Doesnt hurt my sensitive skin, smells wonderful and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Beka

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer! It took me a long time to find one that didn’t feel oily or too thick on my skin, but this one feels wonderful. It works great always, whether I’m breaking out or sunburnt or having a good skin day.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Leza

customer_reviews.title: Like the multi vitamin in product
customer_reviews.text: smooth. Like the multi vitamin in product. Tightens skin while leaving smooth. Not greasy. Perfect for normal to slightly dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Whitters

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable face lotion.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion. Great moisture, not greasy and has a nice light smell that's not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this moisturizer!!
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin on my face and this stuff is by far my favorite!! My skin gets super dry and flaky and this makes it better over night!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Price

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, wears slightly heavy
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant scent, leaves my skin feeling silky but doesn't wear as light as neutrogena rapid clear acne defense. I wear this as a night cream.
customer_reviews.author: KMichigan

customer_reviews.title: My daily moisturizer and i love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer, goes on smooth, has a nice scent and does not cause breakouts. Many moisturizers have a watery feel to them and leave your skin feeling like it didn't even get any added moisture, but this leaves your skin feeling soft and moisturized
customer_reviews.author: lisagat

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Very light and easy to spread on your face. Then I add SPF 80 sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Bets

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy cream. Not good for summer. Felt my face suffocating after I put it on. I had to wipe it off with a cleansing wipe. Also the smell! It smells like the restroom air fresheners that automatically spritz every 15 minutes. Hate the smell more than anything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good natural lotion
customer_reviews.text: I used this lotion while pregnant to make sure I wasn't putting added harmful chemicals into my body I love this product so much that I continue to use it
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer which not only suits sensitive skin, but suitable for all skins
customer_reviews.author: Preethy Moorthy

customer_reviews.title: Replacing and old favorite.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work very well, although I haven't used it very long. I am trying to find a product to replace the discontinued Neutrogena Moisture Wrap that I used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A Donnell

customer_reviews.title: I would never use this product ever again. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I would never use this product ever again. I been this for a week and this product cause my skin to break out and clog pores.
customer_reviews.author: Zhou An Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Smells so great and it leaves my skin feeling great.
customer_reviews.text: Smells so great and it leaves my skin feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product I can use.
customer_reviews.text: I have severe contact allergies. I have suffered with them for years. I have used, and thrown away, dozens of products labeled "for sensitive skin". This is the only moisturizer I can use.
customer_reviews.author: avmanor

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product and have been using for almost 2 years now. I have sensitive skin and it works great and has never caused irritation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: did  wonders for me
customer_reviews.text: It worked wonders and while my 60+ year old face did not turn into a 20 something face, the quality of the skin and lessening of the age spots has delighted me. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J.

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Naturals Multi-Vitamin Nourishing Daily Face Moisturizer with Antioxidant Bionutrients & Vitamins B, C & E, Non-Comedogenic & Sulfate-, Paraben-, Phthalate- & Dye-Free, 3 fl. oz
product_meta.description:
Color:BasicNeutrogena Naturals Multi-Vitamin Nourishing Moisturizer replenishes essential skin nutrients and provides continuous moisture nourishment throughout the day. Its unique formula contains 97% naturally-derived ingredients, including vitamins B, C, and E, and antioxidant omega bionutrients for healthier, younger-looking skin. This daily face moisturizer is clinically proven to help boost skin's defense against dullness and roughness, leaving skin younger-looking today and in the future. From the Neutrogena Naturals line of ecologically sensitive skincare products, this antioxidant facial moisturizer contains no harsh chemical sulfates, paraben, petrolatum, dyes, or phthalates. It's also allergy-tested and non-comedogenic, so it won't clog pores.

BRAND STORY
By Neutrogena
feature_bullets: 3-fluid ounce tube of Neutrogena Naturals Multi-Vitamin Nourishing Moisturizer hydrates skin and replenishes essential nutrients throughout the day
This daily face moisturizer is clinically proven to improve dullness and roughness, for younger, healthier-looking skin
It is carefully formulated with 97% naturally derived ingredients and is fortified with vitamins B, C, E, and antioxidant omega bionutrients
The antioxidant moisturizer is sulfate-, paraben-, petrolatum-, dye- and phthalate-free, and is allergy-tested and non-comedogenic, so it won't clog pores
Experience softer and naturally radiant skin with this nourishing facial moisturizer
